Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Private Events Scroll Down to Content Book an Event Whether it be a birthday party, special occasion, family get together or business meeting, we have the ability to accommodate up to 200 people at one of our locations. Let us cater a custom menu to meet your event needs. For all inquiries, please fill out the form below and we’ll be in touch soon. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Belfair Towne Village (Bluffton) 107 Towne Drive, Bluffton, SC 29910 843 757 9500 Order Now Sunday - Thursday 11:00 AM – 9:00 PMFriday - Saturday 11:00 AM – 10:00 PM Whether you’re craving a New York-style slice between meetings, or a relaxing bite to eat, NYCP has you covered. Our Belfair Towne Village pizzeria has delivery and Takeout options, allowing you to enjoy our delicious pizza in the comfort of your own home. With space for up to 70 guests, choose NYCP for your next birthday party or social gathering. 100% All-Natural Ingredients ● Prepared Fresh No Reservations Needed ● Space For Events Recently Renovated Location ● Welcoming Staff Online Delivery ● Takeout Child-Friendly Atmosphere Service Dogs Allowed Large Pet-friendly Outdoor Dining Area Parking ● Free Wi-fi Join our Loyalty Program Get Directions Email Signup Email Signup Please, enter a valid first name First Name - Required Please, enter a valid last name Last Name - Required Please, enter a valid email Email - Required Submit Please check errors in the form above Thank you for signing up for email updates! Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Festival Centre (North End) 45 Pembroke Drive Ste 105, Hilton Head Island, SC 29926 843 689 2229 Order Now Monday - Thursday 11:00 AM – 9:00 PMFriday - Sunday 11:00 AM – 10:00 PM Next time you find yourself at the Festival Centre, why not drop by NYCP on the North End and try our fresh New York-style pizza for yourself? Made with the highest quality ingredients cooked fresh every day, our menu offers a glimpse of truly authentic Italian cuisine. Enjoy a delicious slice of pizza to-go, or sit at our beautiful outdoor bar to get a taste of the best Italian food the town has to offer. Don’t miss out on our Happy Hour, complete with our special Happy Hour Menu! With space to house 150 diners, NYCP Festival Centre is an easy choice for group dinners, birthdays, or other social events. 100% All-Natural Ingredients ● Prepared Fresh No Reservations Needed ● Space For Events Online Delivery ● Takeout Child-Friendly Atmosphere Happy Hour Menu ● Welcoming Staff Service Dogs Allowed ● Pet-friendly Outdoor Dining Area Ample Parking Available ● Free Wi-Fi Join our Loyalty Program Get Directions Email Signup Email Signup Please, enter a valid first name First Name - Required Please, enter a valid last name Last Name - Required Please, enter a valid email Email - Required Submit Please check errors in the form above Thank you for signing up for email updates! Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Buckwalter Place (Bluffton) 103 Buckwalter Place Blvd, Unit 108, Bluffton, SC 29910 (843) 837-4800 Order Now Sunday - Thursday 11:00 AM – 9:00 PMFriday - Saturday 11:00 AM – 10:00 PM Pizza lovers of Bluffton rejoice, we have opened a second NYCP restaurant in the neighborhood! Stop by our new Buckwalter Place location to satisfy those cravings. Whether it's a slice to-go, a pie for yourself, or a family meal, we’ve got you covered. Our authentic Italian dishes are made with fresh, high-quality ingredients so you can get the taste of Italy, right here in Bluffton. With space for 75 guests, NYCP Buckwalter Place can host any event you want. This new location is truly the ideal setting for your next social gathering. 100% All-Natural Ingredients ● Prepared Fresh No Reservations Needed ● Space For Events Online Delivery ● Takeout Child-Friendly Atmosphere ● Welcoming Staff Service Dogs Allowed Ample Parking Available ● Free Wi-Fi Join our Loyalty Program Get Directions Email Signup Email Signup Please, enter a valid first name First Name - Required Please, enter a valid last name Last Name - Required Please, enter a valid email Email - Required Submit Please check errors in the form above Thank you for signing up for email updates! Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Downtown (Charleston) 190 E Bay St #102, Charleston, SC 29401 843 805 5933 Order Now Sunday - Thursday 11:00 AM – 9:00 PMFriday - Saturday 11:00 AM – 10:00 PM Ever find yourself wandering around downtown Charlestown with a rumbling stomach? Satisfy those hunger pangs with our fresh New York-style pizza, made with the highest quality ingredients. Situated near the French Quarter and open-air market, our pizzeria has indoor and outdoor dining options. Come and taste authentic Italian dishes made to order with select ingredients. You can also opt for Takeout if you want to enjoy our pizza in the comfort of your own home. With space for 75 guests, we have more than enough room for everyone. Be sure to drop by during Happy Hour! 100% All-Natural Ingredients ● Prepared Fresh No Reservations Needed ● Welcoming Staff Online Ordering ● Takeout Child-Friendly Atmosphere Service Dogs Allowed Free Wi-Fi Join our Loyalty Program Get Directions Email Signup Email Signup Please, enter a valid first name First Name - Required Please, enter a valid last name Last Name - Required Please, enter a valid email Email - Required Submit Please check errors in the form above Thank you for signing up for email updates! Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Heritage Plaza (South End) 81 Pope Avenue, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928 843 842 2227 Order Now Sunday - Thursday 11:00 AM – 9:00 PMFriday - Saturday 11:00 AM – 10:00 PM Located just a stone’s throw from Coligny Beach, customers are welcomed to Heritage Plaza by the pleasant scent of our New York-style pizza. Enjoy authentic, home-cooked Italian cuisine and refreshing drinks at our South End restaurant. With space for 100 guests, we are fully equipped to host parties, work gatherings, or social events, all in the child-friendly, welcoming atmosphere created by our outstanding staff. In a hurry? You can grab a slice to go! Or put your feet up and order NYCP to be delivered right to your door. 100% All-Natural Ingredients ● Prepared Fresh No Reservations Needed ● Space For Events Online Delivery ● Takeout ● Welcoming Staff ● Child-Friendly Atmosphere ● Service Dogs Allowed Street Parking ● Free Wi-Fi Join our Loyalty Program Get Directions Email Signup Email Signup Please, enter a valid first name First Name - Required Please, enter a valid last name Last Name - Required Please, enter a valid email Email - Required Submit Please check errors in the form above Thank you for signing up for email updates!
